Description.Title: NetRadiationEquivalentEvaporation
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson; Glen S. Francis; Derick R. Wilson; Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: This EnergyBalance component computes the net radiation expressed as an equivalent evaporation rate by dividing net radiation at the canopy surface by the latent heat of vaporization of water (lambdaV) and converting to mass flux (Ã—1000). It is used downstream to drive evapotranspiration and heat flux calculations within the SiriusQuality2-style energy balance chain.
Description.ShortDescription: Converts net radiation to equivalent evaporation using lambdaV.

Input.name: lambdaV
Input.description: latent heat of vaporization of water

Function.name: CalculateModel
Function.description: Compute netRadiationEquivalentEvaporation from netRadiation and lambdaV.
